author: CMS-HGCAL
body:
## PR description:

This adds work from the Raw Data Handling Group of the HGCal DPG.

This PR includes:
1. Updates to the unpacker (for the test beam last week)
   * Follow up on PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41461.
   * We moved the emulators to more appropriate location (`EventFilter/HGCalRawToDigi`  `SimCalorimetry/HGCalSimAlgos`), they will be subject of a future PR.
1. Updates to the logical mapping & (dense) indexing in `Geometry/HGCalMapping`.
   * Follow up PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43751.
1. The introduction of electronics configuration & calibrations, read from JSONs in `CondFormats`.
   * No need to create special tag for these records yet as this is work in progress.
1. New Alpaka SoA formats for DIGI and RecHits in `DataFormats/HGCalDigi/interface/HGCalDigiSoA.h`.
1. Alpaka calibration kernels for the DIGI  RecHit step.
1. ~Adding `TH2Poly` for DQM.~ Removed from this PR (see [below](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45665/#issuecomment-2312871831)).

We kindly request this to be merged into `CMSSW_14_1_0_pre7` in time for the coming September test beams where validation will continue.

## PR validation:
No CMSSW workflow is impacted by this PR.

We validated this with test beam data last week. You can find latest DQM plots here: http://hgc-vm-2024.cern.ch:8070/dqm/online-dev/session

## Further documentation
* https://indico.cern.ch/event/1417813/#7-raw-data-handling-towards-be
* We are working on documentation for the HGCal website: https://hgcaldocs.web.cern.ch ([Gitlab](https://gitlab.cern.ch/hgcal-dpg/hgcal-website/-/tree/dev/rawdata/docs/RawDataHandling))
